Source: From 1872, Dr. Bernhard von Gudden led the institution – the psychiatrist who is associated with the death of King Ludwig II.
Reference: Ab 1872 leitete Dr. Bernhard von Gudden die Einrichtung - jener Psychiater, der in Zusammenhang mit dem Tod von König Ludwigs II. gebracht wird.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to de: From 1872, Dr. Bernhard von Gudden led the institution – the psychiatrist who is associated with the death of King Ludwig II. The king was killed in a duel on the night of 4 July 1872, at the age of 39. The story was told by his son and heir, Prince Albert, in his memoirs.
Dr. Bernhard von Gudden was the first psychiatrist to lead the psychiatric institute in Austria-Hungary. He was also the first to be killed in a duel during his career. In this case, he was the victim of the duel between the Duke of Teschen and Count Karl von Gernitz, both of whom were friends of King Ludwig II. The duke died that day, and the count was wounded but survived. Both men were killed by the duelists. Dr. Bernhard von Gudden was not only responsible for the deaths of the Duke and the count, but he also had a significant influence on the development of psychiatry in Austria-Hungary. He founded several important institutions, including the Vienna General Hospital, the Kaiser Wilhelm Institute, and the Imperial University Medical School.

Source: The Isar Amper Clinic, East Munich, has been located there since 2006, one of the largest psychiatric units in Germany.

Translation:

It is a non-profit organization with a focus on the treatment of patients who have not yet found their way to the standard care for mental disorders.

The clinic offers both residential and outpatient services. Residential therapy involves individual sessions, group therapy, support groups, as well as individual counseling. Outpatient therapy includes psychotherapy and medication management. The clinic also offers various therapeutic programs for adults and children, including language therapy and occupational therapy.

In addition to the usual treatments provided by the clinic, they offer a range of other services such as:

- Counseling
- Psychoanalysis
- Group Therapy
- Support Groups
- Individual Counseling
- Medication Management

The Isar Amper Clinic provides a comprehensive service package that caters to different needs and preferences of its clients. This includes everything from basic medical care to more advanced therapies like cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and psychodynamic therapy.

Reference: Die Bomben der Alliierten rissen im Dezember 1944 viele Löcher in die Innenstadt.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to de: The bombs of the Allies tore many holes in the city centre in December 1944. In the same month, the Germans launched a surprise attack on the city and took it over by surprise.

Deutsch

Im Dezember 1944 tauchten die Befehle der Vereinten Nationen in das Stadtzentrum ein. Im selben Monat kam die deutsche Armee auf den Markt und nahm es am Ende des Monats ab. 

Translation:

The bombs of the Allies tore many holes in the city center in December 1944. In the same month, the Germans launched a surprise attack on the city and took it over by surprise.

German

Translation:

The bombs of the Allies tore many holes in the city center in December 1944. In the same month, the Germans launched a surprise attack on the city and took it over by surprise.

Source: One big one remains up to this day – at the Marienhof.
Reference: Ein großes blieb bis heute - am Marienhof.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to de: One big one remains up to this day – at the Marienhof. This is a very old building, and it has been used for many centuries by people of all walks of life.

De Texte de l'anglais en français:

Un grand reste toujours à cette date – au Marienhof. C'est un bâtiment très ancien qui a été utilisé par des gens d'une variété d'époques. 

Je suis désolé si cela me manque d'aide. Je serai ravi de vous donner plus d'informations sur le Marienhof. 

En tant que curieux, je m'intéresse particulièrement à la construction du Marienhof, car il est le premier bâtiment de l'Europe moderne et son architecture est remarquable.

Je pense qu'il serait intéressant de voir comment les bâtiments modernes se sont construits dans l'espace et dans leur contexte historique. Ils doivent également être conçus pour répondre aux besoins des utilisateurs actuels et futurs.

Le Marienhof est considéré comme une monument historique important. Il joue un rôle important dans la vie locale et nationale, mais aussi dans la société é

Source: The English Institute, small commercial premises and a crypt chapel from the Middle Ages once stood in the Marienhof, where these days, preparations for the second S-Bahn main line are underway, with first digging to follow on 5th April 2017.
Reference: Das Englische Institut, kleine Geschäftshäuser und eine Gruftkapelle aus dem Mittelalter standen einst am Marienhof, wo dieser Tage die Vorarbeiten und am 5. April 2017 der Spatenstich für die zweite S-Bahn-Stammstrecke erfolgen.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to de: The English Institute, small commercial premises and a crypt chapel from the Middle Ages once stood in the Marienhof, where these days, preparations for the second S-Bahn main line are underway, with first digging to follow on 5th April 2017. The institute is currently being renovated. In order to be able to use this building as a place of worship, it will have to be converted into a church.

English

The English Institute, small commercial premises and a crypt chapel from the Middle Ages once stood in the Marienhof, where these days, preparations for the second S-Bahn main line are underway, with first digging to follow on 5th April 2017. The institute is currently being renovated. In order to be able to use this building as a place of worship, it will have to be converted into a church.

Source: You can use the slider control to compare the old Munich map with the aerial view from today – and to fill in the hole at the Marienhof.
Reference: Mit dem Schieberegler lässt sich die alte München-Karte mit dem Luftbild von heute vergleichen - und das Loch am Marienhof auffüllen.
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to de: You can use the slider control to compare the old Munich map with the aerial view from today – and to fill in the hole at the Marienhof. This will allow you to see how much the area has changed over time.

Deutsch:

Sie können die Slider-Komponente verwenden, um das alte München-Mapschuetz mit dem Aerial-View des täglichen Ortes zu vergleichen – und um die Lücke im Marienhof zu fillen. Dies wird Ihnen ermöglichen, die Zeit verfolgen, wie viel das Gebiet sich verändert hat. 

Es ist wichtig zu beachten, dass der Slider-Komponente nur die Position und Größe der Elemente kann. Es gibt keine Möglichkeit, eine äußere Darstellung oder ein Detail anzuzeigen.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass es nicht möglich ist, das alte München-Mapschuetz zu überprüfen oder zu bearbeiten, ohne dass es eine vollständige Darstellung der aktuell erfassten Lage der Stadt ist.

Bitte beachten Sie auch, dass es keine Möglichkeit ist, den Aerial-View von einem anderen Ort zu verwenden, um die Änderungen auszuführen

Source: Civil rights group issues travel warning for Missouri
Reference: Bürgerrechtsgruppe veröffentlicht Reisewarnung für Missouri
Translation:
Translate the following text from en to de: Civil rights group issues travel warning for Missouri

German title: Stiftung für Menschenrechte schickt Reise-Beispiele für Missouri

Translation:

Stiftung für Menschenrechte, a civil rights organization, has issued a travel warning for Missouri. This is due to an ongoing investigation into alleged human trafficking and forced labor in the state.

The organization's travel advisory advises travelers to avoid visiting any areas of Missouri that have been identified as being involved in such activities. The reason for this advice is that the organization believes that such activities are illegal and unethical, and it wants to prevent people from coming into contact with such practices.

The organization also notes that there may be other safety concerns related to traveling in Missouri, including risks associated with natural disasters or extreme weather conditions.

In conclusion, the travel warning issued by the Stiftung für Menschenrechte for Missouri serves to raise awareness about the dangers of engaging with human trafficking and forced labor in the state. It aims to encourage travelers to stay away from these areas and take necessary precautions to ensure their safety during their travels. The organization's advice is aimed at promoting responsible travel and preventing harm to individuals who may come into contact with such practices.
